org.influxdata.platform.option

Class PlatformOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.influxdata.platform.option.PlatformOptions

  • public final class PlatformOptions
extends Object
    PlatformOptions are used to configure the InfluxData Platform connections.
    Author:
    Jakub Bednar (bednar@github) (05/09/2018 10:22)
